thread.title: BRIEF-SAG GEST FY Net Loss Widens To 9.8 Mln Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SAG GEST FY Net Loss Widens To 9.8 Mln Euros
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - SAG GEST â€“ Solucoes Automovel Globais SGPS SA:
* SAID ON TUESDAY FY TURNOVER 620.7 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 633.4 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* FY EBITDA 7.7 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 18.2 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* FY NET LOSS 9.8 MILLION EUROS VERSUS LOSS 1.2 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
